#Text= Korra says : " I overheard him on the phone yesterday .

column1: #Text=Asami , I do n't know how to tell you this , but I think your father might be involved with the Equalists .
#Text=" Asami says : " What ?
#Text=I do n't believe this .
#Text=" Mako says : " You spied on Hiroshi ?
#Text=What 's your problem ?
#Text=" Lin says : " Mr. Sato , we just have a few follow - up questions for you .
#Text=" Asami says : " My father is innocent .
#Text=Just because we 're not benders does n't mean we support those awful Equalists .
#Text=" Hiroshi Sato says : " Equalists ?
#Text=Is that what this is about ?
#Text=I can assure you I have nothing to do with those radicals .
#Text=" Mako says : " Yeah , you do n't know what you 're talking about , Korra .
#Text=" Korra says : " I overheard you on the phone .
#Text=You said the Cabbage Corp investigation bought you time , and you 're getting ready to strike .
#Text=Explain that !
#Text=" Hiroshi Sato says : " This is all just a misunderstanding , resulting from the young Avatar 's overactive imagination .
#Text=My number one competitor was knocked out of the game .
#Text=It 's providing me an opportunity to strike the market with a new line of Satomobiles .
#Text=It 's just business .
#Text=Nothing nefarious .
#Text=" Tenzin says : " In order to put all suspicions to rest , might we have a look into your factories and warehouses ?
#Text=" Hiroshi Sato says : " If you feel it 's necessary , you 're welcome to search all of Future Industries .
#Text="
